details.name: Mobile device detection works correctly
details.details: Mobile video element is properly rendered in JSX for mobile devices

details.name: Static image fallback displays on mobile
details.details: Static image is displayed as background on mobile devices

details.name: YouTube video is visible on mobile
details.details: YouTube video is rendered on all screen sizes including mobile

details.name: Mobile video loads on mobile devices
details.details: Mobile video element is properly implemented and loads on mobile devices

details.name: Screen size changes are handled correctly
details.details: Component detects and responds to window resize events

details.name: Lazy loading is implemented for mobile video
details.details: IntersectionObserver is used for lazy loading

details.name: Connection quality is considered
details.details: Video loading is disabled on very slow connections

details.name: Battery level is properly considered
details.details: ISSUE: Battery level check is async but result is not used in decision

details.name: Appropriate video sizes are selected
details.details: Different video URLs are provided for different screen sizes

details.name: Touch controls are properly sized
details.details: Mobile video controls have 44px minimum touch targets

details.name: Play/pause functionality works
details.details: Mobile video play/pause controls are implemented

details.name: Mute/unmute functionality works
details.details: Mobile video mute/unmute controls are implemented

details.name: Keyboard navigation is supported
details.details: Mobile video controls support keyboard navigation

details.name: Fallback image displays when video fails
details.details: Static image fallback is implemented for desktop video errors

details.name: Unsupported video format is handled gracefully
details.details: Mobile video error handling is implemented

details.name: Network interruptions are handled gracefully
details.details: Mobile video error handling covers network interruptions

details.name: Aria-labels are provided for screen readers
details.details: Hero section has proper aria-labelledby attribute
